description:
With Tatsuya and Feena`s out in the open, everyone but Karen accepts their relationship! Now, at Karen`s behest, the two are forced to face each other in a kendo match.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Ohime-sama to Ruriiro no Sora no Shita de...
With the Princess Beneath the Bright Blue Sky
お姫様と瑠璃色の空の下で...
